ess-beta-metadata.label: Sports facilities
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Sports facilities per 10,000 people
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows sports facilities per 10,000 people, in England, as at 5 October 2023
ess-beta-metadata.caveats:
Per capita estimates are calculated using the usual resident population estimates from the most recent Census.

Some of this data has been aggregated and may show differences to other published figures.
